id.description: Unique identifier for the todo item, as assigned by the todolist_todos table. Matches the primary key. Always present.

title.description: Title of the todo item. Business rules require between 1 and 255 Unicode characters, must not be all whitespace. Used for display and search.

oneOf.description: Full, optional body text for the todo. Maximum 2000 characters; empty string or null if not supplied. Only visible to the owner.
Full, optional body text for the todo. Maximum 2000 characters; empty string or null if not supplied. Only visible to the owner.

description.description: Full, optional body text for the todo. Maximum 2000 characters; empty string or null if not supplied. Only visible to the owner.

oneOf.description: Optional due date for the todo in ISO 8601 UTC format. Value must be present or future at time of creation/update; null if not set.
Optional due date for the todo in ISO 8601 UTC format. Value must be present or future at time of creation/update; null if not set.

due_date.description: Optional due date for the todo in ISO 8601 UTC format. Value must be present or future at time of creation/update; null if not set.

completed.description: True if the todo is finished; false if still open. Set/changed by the user, follows business rules for status transitions.

oneOf.description: Timestamp in UTC when completed status was last set true. Null if never completed or if reverted open. Set automatically by system logic.
Timestamp in UTC when completed status was last set true. Null if never completed or if reverted open. Set automatically by system logic.

completed_at.description: Timestamp in UTC when completed status was last set true. Null if never completed or if reverted open. Set automatically by system logic.

created_at.description: Timestamp in UTC when the todo was created. Immutable business audit field. Set by server at creation.

updated_at.description: UTC timestamp of last modification of any field. Updated on every change, used for sorting and audit purposes.

ITodoListTodo.IRequest,[object Object].description: Comprehensive representation of a single todoList todo entity. Each todo instance is fully owned by exactly one user (owner is inferred from authenticated user context, never exposed directly for privacy). Includes all displayable business fields: id, title, optional description, optional due_date, completion status, and relevant timestamps (created, updated, completed). Does not include deleted_at (soft deletes are hidden from user queries and API responses).
